cli.app.title: PhiFanmade Open Source Toolkit CLI
cli.msg.loaded: Successfully loaded the chart into workspace {workspace}!
cli.msg.cleared: Whoosh~ All workspaces have been cleaned up!
cli.warn.rpe.convert: RPE conversion is still in progress, please wait a moment~
cli.err.unknown: Oops? I don't recognize this command yet, try 'version' or check the README~
cli.err.unimplemented: This command feature is not fully implemented yet...
cli.err.input.required: Please provide --input, or you can use --workspace as an alternative~
cli.err.output.required: Please provide --output so I can save it for you~
